fields.name: CounterSets
fields.description: Host name for the IoT hub associated to the device.

fields.name: MdmAccount
fields.description: The MDM account to which the counters should be pushed.

fields.name: MetricNameSpace
fields.description: The MDM namespace to which the counters should be pushed. This is required if MDMAccount is specified

fields.name: ResourceId
fields.description: The Resource ID on which the metrics should be pushed.
